body_html:
Operating System: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
The picture in my last comment was taken under Firefox 42.

Now I tested on chrome Version 47.0.2526.73 (64-bit) and now I can scroll all the way to the bottom but the scroll bar disappear in the bottom of the screen: https://goo.gl/photos/DbTTZhEMXfD8gVXR8

body:
Operating System: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
The picture in my last comment was taken under Firefox 42.

Now I tested on chrome Version 47.0.2526.73 (64-bit) and now I can scroll all the way to the bottom but the scroll bar disappear in the bottom of the screen: https://goo.gl/photos/DbTTZhEMXfD8gVXR8
